Description:
Detect suspicious parent processes of well-known Windows processes

Author: vburov
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Windows Processes Suspicious Parent Directory
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\svchost.exe' or process_path like '%\taskhost.exe' or process_path like '%\lsm.exe' or process_path like '%\lsass.exe' or process_path like '%\services.exe' or process_path like '%\lsaiso.exe' or process_path like '%\csrss.exe' or process_path like '%\wininit.exe' or process_path like '%\winlogon.exe') and  not ((parent_process_path = 'null' and parent_process_path = '-') or ((parent_process_path like '%\savservice.exe' or parent_process_path like '%\ngen.exe') and (parent_process_path like '%\system32\%' or parent_process_path like '%\syswow64\%')) or ((parent_process_path like '%\windows defender\%' or parent_process_path like '%\microsoft security client\%') and parent_process_path like '%\msmpeng.exe')))
